trans-unit.source: Defines an installer that either succeeds completely or fails and leaves the computer in its initial state.
trans-unit.target: 定義完全成功或失敗的安裝程式，並且保留電腦在初始狀態。

trans-unit.source: To run installers in a transaction, add them to the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property of this <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> instance.
trans-unit.target: 若要在交易中執行安裝程式，將它們加入<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>屬性這<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.%23ctor%2A>，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).
trans-unit.target: 此範例中提供類似的實作[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。

trans-unit.source: It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly.
trans-unit.target: 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are used if there is a previous assembly in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果選項未指定組件前, 一個組件的選項會使用清單中沒有先前的組件。

trans-unit.source: If either the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 「 / u"或"/ 解除安裝 」 指定選項時，會解除安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If the "/?"
or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 或"/ 說明 」 提供選項，主控台就會顯示 [說明] 資訊。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> in which this method saves information needed to perform a commit, rollback, or uninstall operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，其中這個方法儲存執行認可、復原或解除安裝作業所需的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Performs the installation.
trans-unit.target: 執行安裝。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A> method of each installer contained in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property of this instance.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A>方法中所包含的每個安裝程式<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>這個執行個體的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object referenced by the `savedState` parameter is updated to reflect the status of the installation after the contained installers have run.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>所參考物件`savedState`參數會更新以反映安裝狀態，在執行所包含的安裝程式。

trans-unit.source: If all the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A> methods succeed, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果要將所有<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A>方法成功，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>方法呼叫。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A> method is called for each installer.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Rollback%2A>方法針對每個安裝程式呼叫。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.%23ctor%2A>，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example provides an implementation similar to that of InstallUtil.exe.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會提供類似 InstallUtil.exe 的實作。

trans-unit.source: It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly.
trans-unit.target: 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assemblies options are taken if there is a previous assembly in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果選項未指定組件，如果在清單中上一個組件，會採取先前的組件選項。

trans-unit.source: If the '/u' or '/uninstall' option is specified then the assemblies are uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 ' / u' 或 '/ 解除安裝' 選項指定，則會解除安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If the '/?'
or '/help' option is provided then the help information is printed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 或 '/ 協助' 提供選項，則 [說明] 資訊列印至主控台。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="savedState" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 參數為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The installation failed, and is being rolled back.
trans-unit.target: 安裝失敗，正在進行復原。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> specified by the <paramref name="savedState" /> parameter should be empty when passed to the <see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />所指定<paramref name="savedState" />參數應該是空白時傳遞至<see cref="M:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install(System.Collections.IDictionary)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" /> that contains the state of the computer after the installation completed.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.IDictionary" />，包含安裝完成之後電腦的狀態。

trans-unit.source: Removes an installation.
trans-unit.target: 移除安裝。

trans-unit.source: Call this method to remove a previously completed installation.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個方法來移除先前已完成的安裝。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A> method of each installer in the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A> property to uninstall any resources set during installation.
trans-unit.target: 這<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A>方法呼叫<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Uninstall%2A>方法中的每個安裝程式<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Installers%2A>在安裝期間設定屬性，以解除安裝任何資源。

trans-unit.source: Any exceptions during uninstallation are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 解除安裝期間的任何例外狀況都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A> methods save the state of the computer after the installations, the file containing the <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> from the `savedState` parameter might have been deleted at some point after the installation was complete.
trans-unit.target: 雖然<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Install%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.Installer.Commit%2A>方法儲存電腦的狀態之後安裝檔案包含<xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>從`savedState`參數可能已刪除在某個時間點後安裝已完成。

trans-unit.source: If the file is deleted, the `savedState` parameter is `null`.
trans-unit.target: 刪除檔案時，如果`savedState`參數是`null`。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.%23ctor%2A>, <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A> and <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller> class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.%23ctor%2A>，<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Install%2A>和<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller.Uninstall%2A>方法<xref:System.Configuration.Install.TransactedInstaller>類別。

trans-unit.source: This example provides an implementation similar to that of [Installutil.exe (Installer Tool)](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md).
trans-unit.target: 此範例中提供類似的實作[Installutil.exe （安裝程式工具）](~/docs/framework/tools/installutil-exe-installer-tool.md)。

trans-unit.source: It installs assemblies with the options preceding that particular assembly.
trans-unit.target: 它會與之前的該特定的組件選項安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If an option is not specified for an assembly, the previous assembly's options are used if there is a previous assembly in the list.
trans-unit.target: 如果選項未指定組件前, 一個組件的選項會使用清單中沒有先前的組件。

trans-unit.source: If either the "/u" or "/uninstall" option is specified, the assemblies are uninstalled.
trans-unit.target: 如果 「 / u"或"/ 解除安裝 」 指定選項時，會解除安裝組件。

trans-unit.source: If the "/?"
or "/help" option is provided, the help information is displayed to the console.
trans-unit.target: 或"/ 說明 」 提供選項，主控台就會顯示 [說明] 資訊。
